name: Mahou Shoujo Nanoha A's Portable: The Gears of Destiny
name_original: Mahou Shoujo Nanoha A's Portable: The Gears of Destiny
description: Mahou Shoujo Lyrical Nanoha A's Portable: The Gears of Destiny (English Patched) (魔法少女リリカルなのはA's PORTABLE －THE GEARS OF DESTINY－) is a Fighting video game published by Bandai Namco Games released on December 22nd, 2011 for the PlayStation Portable.
